title: U.S. Department of State Launches the End Plastic Pollution ...
body: On the margins of the 78th UN General Assembly, Jose W. Fernandez, Under Secretary of State for Economic Growth, Energy, and the Environment, launched the End Plastic Pollution International Collaborative (EPPIC) with $15 million in initial U.S. funding. EPPIC is a public-private partnership built to catalyze governments, NGOs, and businesses to support innovative solutions to […]
